will you do, Hubert?"},{"lineNumber":97357,"originalJapaneseLine":"　私はどちらでもいい、貴方の言葉に従うわ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm fine either way, I'll obey your there's even a little hope...\""},{"lineNumber":97360,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":97361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は少しだけの望みなんていらない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I don't want just a little hope."},{"lineNumber":97362,"originalJapaneseLine":"　望みがないのならひと思いに……」","translatedEnglishLine":"If there is no hope, then just end it quickly...\""},{"lineNumber":97363,"originalJapaneseLine":"二人の女性が、","translatedEnglishLine":"The two women"},{"lineNumber":97364,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジッとヒューバートの顔を見つめていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"stared intently at Hubert's face."},{"lineNumber":97365,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なあ、お前ら……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, you two...\""},{"lineNumber":97366,"originalJapaneseLine":"「全部、嘘だろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's all a lie, right?\""},{"lineNumber":97367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、ばれた？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, caught?\""},{"lineNumber":97368,"originalJapaneseLine":"「やーね、疑り深い人」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geez, such a suspicious person.\""},{"lineNumber":97369,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":97370,"originalJapaneseLine":"「俺の周りの女はよぉ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The women around me, you know...\""},{"lineNumber":97371,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　なんの騒ぎ？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm? What's the commotion?"},{"lineNumber":97372,"originalJapaneseLine":"　てか、あんた誰？」","translatedEnglishLine":"By the way, who are you?\""},{"lineNumber":97373,"originalJapaneseLine":"「誰がヒューバートの玉の輿に乗るかって話。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is about who gets to ride Hubert's golden carriage."},{"lineNumber":97374,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんたも一口乗る？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you want a share too?\""},{"lineNumber":97375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、なに、いいの？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eh, what, is that okay?"},{"lineNumber":97376,"originalJapaneseLine":"　乗る乗る」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'll ride, I'll ride!\""},{"lineNumber":97377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":97378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「や、ヘルマンの女ってなぁ、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, the women of Helman, you see,"},{"lineNumber":97379,"originalJapaneseLine":"　実際……本当にたくましいよ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"are actually... really tough...\""},{"lineNumber":97380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「なぁによ、人の顔見ながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey now, why do you have such a bitter look on your face while looking at me?"},{"lineNumber":97381,"originalJapaneseLine":"　苦虫噛み潰したような顔して」","translatedEnglishLine":"Like you’ve chewed on a bitter bug.\""},{"lineNumber":97382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおー！　恋人のイオの言うことなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Whoa! If it’s what my girlfriend Io says,"},{"lineNumber":97383,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なんでも聞いてやりたい気持ちだぞー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I want to listen to anything!\""},{"lineNumber":97384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えーっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ehh!\""},{"lineNumber":97385,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが催眠にかかった。","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance fell under hypnosis."},{"lineNumber":97386,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おーほほほほほほ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ohohohohohoho!"},{"lineNumber":97387,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランスったらめちゃんこ強い癖に、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance, despite being incredibly strong,"},{"lineNumber":97388,"originalJapaneseLine":"　催眠にかかりやすいから、だーい好き！」","translatedEnglishLine":"is so susceptible to hypnosis, I absolutely love it!\""},{"lineNumber":97389,"originalJapaneseLine":"犯人はイオだった。","translatedEnglishLine":"The culprit was Io."},{"lineNumber":97390,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ら、ランス様、正気に戻って下さい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"L-Lance-sama, please come back to your senses!\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっといいなと思ってたのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I was thinking you were kind of nice."
"Hey, so, what do you really think?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私、こう見えて結構尽くす女よ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I may look like this, but I’m actually quite a devoted woman, you know?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あら、面白そうな話してるのね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Oh my, sounds like an interesting conversation."
"But if it's that kind of talk...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私を通して欲しいもの、ね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You want me to be the one to get it, right?"
"Hey, what exactly do you mean by that..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「これ以上、女の口から言わせるのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Isn't it a bit rude to make a woman say more than this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 私はどちらでもいい、貴方の言葉に従うわ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I'm fine either way, I'll obey your words."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしも少しでも望みがあるのなら……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there's even a little hope..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「私は少しだけの望みなんていらない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I don't want just a little hope.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 望みがないのならひと思いに……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If there is no hope, then just end it quickly..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジッとヒューバートの顔を見つめていた。

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: By the way, who are you?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「誰がヒューバートの玉の輿に乗るかって話。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "This is about who gets to ride Hubert's golden carriage.
Do you want a share too?"
"Well, the women of Helman, you see,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 実際……本当にたくましいよ……」

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey now, why do you have such a bitter look on your face while looking at me?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 苦虫噛み潰したような顔して」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Like you’ve chewed on a bitter bug."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおー！　恋人のイオの言うことなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Whoa! If it’s what my girlfriend Io says,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんでも聞いてやりたい気持ちだぞー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I want to listen to anything!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが催眠にかかった。
ランスったらめちゃんこ強い癖に、
催眠にかかりやすいから、だーい好き！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is so susceptible to hypnosis, I absolutely love it!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ら、ランス様、正気に戻って下さい！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "L-Lance-sama, please come back to your senses!"

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
